question: Which among the following is not a layer of atmosphere?
explanation:
The atmosphere is divided in five layers according to the diversity of temperature and density. These 5 layers include:
Troposphere
Stratosphere
Mesosphere
Thermosphere (Ionosphere)
Exosphere

Lithosphere is not a layer of the earth's atmosphere. It is the rigid outer part of the earth, consisting of the crust and upper mantle.
